# Kids 2D Dress-Up Game - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
A kids 2D dress-up web game MVP built with Vite + React + TypeScript, prepared for PixiJS integration.

## Tech Stack
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Framework**: React 18+
- **Language**: TypeScript (strict mode)
- **Graphics**: PixiJS (for 2D game rendering)
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode for all code
- Follow React functional component patterns with hooks
- Keep components simple and focused on MVP functionality
- PixiJS canvas should integrate with React lifecycle

## File Structure
- `src/` - Source code
- `src/components/` - React components
- `src/game/` - PixiJS game logic
- `public/` - Static assets (sprites, images)

## Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
